website_summaries.verdict: Classic girls' socks by a popular brand that are comfortable and stylish.
pros: Made of material that is soft and comfortable
Ankle-length style is easy to wear and work swell for different types of casual outfits
Available in different sizes in options suitable for boys and girls
cons: Material is on the thin side and may not hold up well to repeated washings

customer_reviews.title: Great socks.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old had a growth spurt and suddenly needed larger socks (or slowly outgrew the old ones and did not tell me, whatever). Because of her eczema she has to wear socks all day and night and is rather selective about her socks. These appealed to her because they are bright, fit over wraps and she can mix and match. They went straight into the wash on arrival and have been pronounced 'the best socks ever'. In fact, we just ordered a second pack. Great price, cute colors, Hanes quality. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Size 10 1/2- 4. Fit great on my 5 year old. Seem like the Nike version of this style just lesser quality. We'll see how they hold up. Seem fine for now and got them for $7 so you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: they are a little more forgiving than the no show socks and we can still do the smaller size and she's happy.
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter is a size 4 in youth shoes and we struggle because she's in that awkward inbetween where the smaller sizes are becoming too small, but the next size up is too big. With these ankle socks, they are a little more forgiving than the no show socks and we can still do the smaller size and she's happy.
customer_reviews.author: M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great value for quantity received
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy since it is so difficult finding ankle/crew socks in this age of no show socks. The no show socks always fall and we needed socks that showed and stayed up. These were exactly what we needed and it fit as expected. The quality of the material is nice and soft and it has held up for many washes so far. I'd definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: maristar

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Crew Socks Received Ankle Socks
customer_reviews.text: The product page has the product as crew socks, which is what I thought I was ordering. When I received the order they were ankle socks. At first I thought I made a mistake and ordered wrong socks for my daughter (She prefers crew over ankle socks). I checked the order in my account and it showed ankle socks, however when I clicked the link to the order it takes me to the product which is crew socks. I had already opened the package and put them away when my daughter told me they were not the right socks.
customer_reviews.author: Loracalyn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality. Won't last.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. After one wash, the socks are full of piling and look terrible. I expected better from Hanes.
customer_reviews.author: The Luna family

customer_reviews.title: they are easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves these, they are easy to put on, she has some coordinate issues, as well sensory, she doesn't like the long socks, or the ankle short ones, so these are perfect for year round as well, they are made well, and have lasted her a long time, since we have been purchasing them for the last 4 years or so..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 for 7. Can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 4 year old daughter. Socks disappear frequently so I just replace them. They're thin,and it's a bargain, so if you just need a thin summer sock or socks to fill the gaps in your sock bucket of lost souls, these are a good fit. Bigger than expected,but they get the job done. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alex d.

customer_reviews.title: It shrinks bad after one wash, very thin too
customer_reviews.text: Size runs small. My daughter is size1, and it's already tight on her. It's very thin and shrinks bad after one wash. I bought another brand at Target, 7 pairs for $5.99, colorful and still extra space on her for growth, best of all, they don't shrink after the wash! Won't buy this anymore, not worth it. They won't last and my daughter will outgrow them very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Jenison

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Size 4-10 fits my 7 1/2 year old's large feet. She's girls' shoe size 5 (which I believe is the same as womens' 7?). They stick out just a little when she wears her high top sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed some inexpensive ankle socks for girls and these fit the bill. They are thin, but I knew they would be because of the price. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C Rus

customer_reviews.title: Look very worn after just one use
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the quality. After just one wear and wash, they started pilling really terribly. I didn't even dry them ; they were hung to dry. In my picture, the purple ones are unused, the white and green ones have been worn and washed once, and the pink ones have been when and washed a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy KB

customer_reviews.title: spares for grandmas house
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these to keep at my house and the girls come without additional socks, these are good price and because of color easy to match after washing.
customer_reviews.author: carole lewis

customer_reviews.title: Missing and stained socks
customer_reviews.text: Missing one of the white/green pair, complete pair of the solid light pink and there is some strange brown stains all over the white/purple pair. I don't think this would happen if purchasing Hanes directly from a local store. Unsure where these socks were packaged from but would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: mo3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks but I wish they were easier to find on competitors' websites because, though these are great quality, I feel I overpaid
customer_reviews.author: Hello Woofy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Well I bought these for my almost 3 year old daughter who is currently in a size 7/8 shoe and they ended up being a tab bit too big but they still work, they are made well, and fairly priced. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dempsey's

customer_reviews.title: A Lesson in Beating the Sock Fairies.
customer_reviews.text: Socks in our home are disposable. If our four and seven year old daughters aren't throwing them away then the puppy is happily tearing them apart, diligence has nothing to do with this. At best we manage to save them to only have the W/D eat one (or both perhaps?). So a good deal on socks is a must and these are great socks for an equally good price. If your child(ren) can wear them more than once then you are already ahead of the Sock Fairies who orchestrate this madness.
customer_reviews.author: Bolivious

customer_reviews.title: WAY smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: The description says size 7-16 girls, but we’re incredibly small on my step-daughter who wears a size 10 in girls. I verified the package and they were in fact supposed to be size 7-16, they just aren’t though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Schultz

customer_reviews.title: This is just a good product and easy to order online vs drag my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just a good product and easy to order online vs drag my kids to the store. your brand had the easiest size chart--socks arent always easy to get the "right" one online, thank you for being 'simple' to get the right ones
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Preston

customer_reviews.title: These socks are extremely thin, and the size 4-10 ...
customer_reviews.text: These socks are extremely thin, and the size 4-10 fit me perfectly (size 11 1/2 women's), so I had to order a different set for my daughter. Because they are so thin the kids wear holes in them in NO time.
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: She said they are comfortable and fit well
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter really likes them. She said they are comfortable and fit well. You can’t beat the price at $6 bucks for 10 pair and good quality also.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL BRIGHT COLORS
customer_reviews.text: These socks are perfect for spring/summer weather. They are a lighter weight than what we need here in the Pacific Northwest during fall/winter. My daughter loves how soft they are and the colors are bright and vivid even through washing. I would definitely recommend them to a friend looking for bright fun socks.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Worthy

customer_reviews.title: Great value in girls cotton socks
customer_reviews.text: Cotton shrunk minimally on washing. Lightweight socks are comfortable under shoes. Variety was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Cay442

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason why they are cheap...
customer_reviews.text: The quality just is not there. After having these for a week, the socks started getting holes in them. We now have maybe half of what we bought left. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: MusingDragonfly

customer_reviews.title: soft high quality good price
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for their softness and high quality. They fit my 8 year old daughter very well
customer_reviews.author: Brant M Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again.
customer_reviews.text: not the best quality. 3 pair of the socks came unraveled in the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love the product love the material left the deal same ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product love the material left the deal same as my son's socks would definitely buy from you guys again and would preview review and feedback on any product recommended to all my friends at school for the children keep up the good work Hanes
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Basulto

customer_reviews.title: Quality that is still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and have lasted through quite a beating! Worn and washed very often, and no holes (as of 8 months later). They are not stiff or scratchy- which is very important for my child. They have some stretch, which makes it easier for them to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Nye

customer_reviews.title: Decent socks
customer_reviews.text: My toddler wears a size 8 shoe and these socks are a bit big. I don't mind it as I'd prefer them big over even slightly too small, which has been my issue with Hanes's socks in the past with my child. They seem like decent quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great Girl Socks
customer_reviews.text: Got several pair of Hanes girls for a local ock drive, they look great. My experience with Hane products have generally been positive in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger K

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake not realizing it was not crew socks
customer_reviews.author: Lis DaRocha

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: These sock 🧦 🧦 fit as expected for the shoe size. Love the soft feel. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cave

customer_reviews.title: These fit great with room to spare
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a size 12. These fit great with room to spare. They have a good thickness as well, so I'm sure they'll last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable as well as high quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult who wears a size womens adult 7.5-8 shoe size. So take my review for what it is. I got them because they are cheap and I just needed some extra socks to exercise in. They are comfortable as well as high quality. Much softer than adult socks.
customer_reviews.author: EarthTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fits!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter wears a size 12, and these fit perfectly with just enough room to grow. She likes them because they come over her ankle. The no-shows slide down into her shoes, but these stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved these. I bought these because you f all the reviews which were right for great fit & great value
customer_reviews.author: louellen zarembski

customer_reviews.title: Yay new socks????
customer_reviews.text: It’s socks....... so if you need em there you go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers ankle
customer_reviews.text: A little loose on my daughters size 11 foot but I suppose that means there is room for her to grow and they will still fit. Very nice soft cotton ankle socks, these are NOT no show ankle socks.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Socks
customer_reviews.text: I love these socks, great fit, colors, size, easy to launder.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Needed Little Girl size but no one makes
customer_reviews.text: Colorful. Made well. Arrived on time. Granddaughter wears size 9 shoe and these socks too big. Seems companies make baby sizes and big girl sizes but none for in between. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: LINDA MILLER

customer_reviews.title: At first these socks seemed great. The colors were bright
customer_reviews.text: At first these socks seemed great. The colors were bright. The cotton was soft. However, they looked terrible after just three washes. There was lots of pilling and fading. I will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: M Shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Thin socks.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are thin for kids who prefer the feel of thinner socks. The Large size is rather large compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: nice seller
customer_reviews.text: Tried to return them because they were a size too big, and the seller instead refunded my money without requiring that I return the item!
customer_reviews.author: CintiOH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed new socks for school so we had purchased these last year! They fit perfectly and are still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Green

customer_reviews.title: Wrong style soocks
customer_reviews.text: Returned. I ordered the wrong style so I returned for correct style.
customer_reviews.author: Pat's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: They definitely don't make these socks the way they used to. My daughter loved the colors, but hates the way they feel. Material is cheap and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these socks. Lightweight and they don't have any strings on the inside. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Struebing

customer_reviews.title: Easy & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits 9 yr old's skinny foot well. Comfortable weight & thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Armyhousewife

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I was ordering toddler socks, but these socks could fit me. None of them fit my 3 year.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip V Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks
customer_reviews.text: Good quality socks. Great value ! Grand daughter loves them. Also she loves the colors of them. Well wrapped, fast shipping. Recommended to all.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Material seems perfect. My daughters foot is smaller then 10 but still works great. Material is a great thin (not too thin) material, easier to put her comfy running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I like receiving items in just a few days
customer_reviews.text: I like the product I would like to get a bigger size in return please.
customer_reviews.author: Palima  coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! My daughter loves these socks. Now, if I could just stop losing them! There hasn't been any shrinkage with laundering. The colors have held up well and not faded any.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my daughter, who is 6, but they were actually an adult size so I must have misread the size. I wear a kids size 6.5. Other than that, they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Turae

customer_reviews.title: which is great most of the year
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat thin, which is great most of the year, but not warm in colder months. Good quality, durable, and practical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seemed very nice, and they were the best value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to include in two operation Christmas Shoebox (Samaritan's Purse) for two girls. I opened the pack and fit 5 pairs in each shoebox. They seemed very nice, and they were the best value!
customer_reviews.author: William Cato

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter need=d. Will continue to buy these until she grows out of them.
customer_reviews.author: LEX

customer_reviews.title: fits great, super soft and does not add bulk to ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my daughter who is 6.5 years old and wears a size 13 shoe. fits great, super soft and does not add bulk to foot size :). fits great
customer_reviews.author: scelestia

customer_reviews.title: last and great assortment of colors
customer_reviews.text: Only socks my daughter will wear. Comfy, last and great assortment of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Woodfired

customer_reviews.title: They do the job but expect sweaty feet
customer_reviews.text: Cute socks, but not a lot of cotton so they lead to sweaty feet.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: I would like all the socks I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Similar to another style of this brand, I only received 8 out of 10 pairs. The socks themselves are good, just wish the pack was complete.
customer_reviews.author: HAM0809

customer_reviews.title: Very nice socks for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice socks for the price. My daughter hates thick socks but these are perfect. Not too thick and not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Ness. E

customer_reviews.title: Love that they are not thick
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are not thick. Too thick and my daughters feet sweat. The allowe her feet to breath and theybwas up great. Colors are not fading at all.

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: Cute and sexy but my grandbaby walks around the house loving them
customer_reviews.author: renaj

customer_reviews.title: Great socks! (Doc Brown having a sock party)
customer_reviews.text: Lots of socks! They're Hanes socks, and the quality is consistent with their other products.

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 8 year old daughter who wears a toddler size 13 and child size 1
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 8 year old daughter who wears a toddler size 13 and child size 1

customer_reviews.title: The colors are pretty vibrant and very cute
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and soft! The colors are pretty vibrant and very cute.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her socks. Perfect size and sit just right on her ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THAT IT IS MATERIAL OF SUPER GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: VERY CUTE, I LOVE THAT IT IS MATERIAL OF SUPER GOOD QUALITY, I LOVE IT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be holding up pretty well to the abuse my 8-year-old puts them through

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, true to size - my daughter LOVES them

customer_reviews.title: ... hanes socks because he says they are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old only wears hanes socks because he says they are much more comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint about these is that they are thinner and wear rather quickly...but hey they are socks.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great value, especially for a child who loves to lose her socks. A nice variety and material is soft and launders well.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Henry

customer_reviews.title: the solid colored ones pilled really quickly and look old ...
customer_reviews.text: the solid colored ones pilled really quickly and look old. Also no traction on the bottom so they are slippery for my 5 year old on our wooden floors.
customer_reviews.author: w/KiddosInManhattan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit socks ok not like the ones years ago ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit socks ok not like the ones years ago a little thin. But that is the way they wear them now.
customer_reviews.author: linda turner

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: The size I bought should have fit but it was way too big

customer_reviews.title: A bit Big
customer_reviews.text: They run closer to the size 16 than the 7. At least my little girl will grow into them. Appears to be quality made and look good.
customer_reviews.author: j rocket

customer_reviews.title: Start pilling after a couple washes
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of socks for the money so value is what is giving it stars. These are not 100% cotton though, and stat pilling after a wash or two.
customer_reviews.author: Allisen Hein

customer_reviews.title: "Very breathable very soft I like them because they don't slip in my shoes
customer_reviews.text: "Very breathable very soft I like them because they don't slip in my shoes. " exactly from my 7yo mouth.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit ! True to size ! $3.00 cheaper than competitors ! Thanks Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Great value and the quality is not bad
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I expected! Great value and the quality is not bad.

customer_reviews.title: Little big and one came with a hole. Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: One of the socks came with a hole. Other than that they were fine. A little big on my little one but will grow into them by next year.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were accepted by my 8 year old so this makes them 5 stars!!!

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but not the greatest quality. After one washing the material has already started "balling up". I wouldn't recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Description for the item I purchased said Color: White ...
customer_reviews.text: Description for the item I purchased said Color: White. The socks received are multicolored, with half being mostly white and half in bright colors.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my kid great
customer_reviews.text: Socks are nice and thick enough for the fall and winter. Not too think for the spring too.

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself I have a small foot and women's socks are normally too large. These fit perfectly I love them.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly for my 4,7,& 8 year olds. I've bought these before and they last a long time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is not complaining about having to wear socks.

product_meta.title: Hanes Girls' Big Ankle EZ Sort Socks, 10-Pack
product_meta.description: The Hanes ankle sock is a great buy for your kid. It features extra durable with reinforced grey heel and toe and EZ sort sock matching to aid with laundry sorting.
feature_bullets: Great color assortments: half solid/half color heel/toe
